channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Service Bridge
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Service Bridge

item.title: CVE-2019-6169|2024-08-04T20:16:24.523Z -- lenovo -- service%20bridge
item.description: A vulnerability reported in Lenovo Service Bridge before version 4.1.0.1 could allow unencrypted downloads over FTP.

item.title: CVE-2019-6168|2024-08-04T20:16:24.577Z -- lenovo -- service%20bridge
item.description: A vulnerability reported in Lenovo Service Bridge before version 4.1.0.1 could allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-6167|2024-08-04T20:16:24.512Z -- lenovo -- service%20bridge
item.description: A vulnerability reported in Lenovo Service Bridge before version 4.1.0.1 could allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-6166|2024-08-04T20:16:24.730Z -- lenovo -- service%20bridge
item.description: A vulnerability reported in Lenovo Service Bridge before version 4.1.0.1 could allow cross-site request forgery.

item.title: CVE-2024-4696|2024-06-14T15:40:41.315Z -- lenovo -- service%20bridge
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Service Bridge prior to version 5.0.2.17 that could allow operating system commands to be executed if a specially crafted link is visited.

item.title: CVE-2024-4696|2024-06-13T20:01:18.145Z -- lenovo -- service%20bridge
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Service Bridge prior to version 5.0.2.17 that could allow operating system commands to be executed if a specially crafted link is visited.
